document.full_text: powerful performances by the german and french economies propelled growth in the euro zone well above forecasts in the first quarter while also highlighting the yawning gap between the bloc's strong and weak.
document.title: germany, france propel euro zone; growth gulf widens
lines_and_colors: powerful performances by the german and french economies propelled growth in the euro zone well above forecasts in the first quarter while also highlighting the yawning gap between the bloc's strong and weak.
